title: GIFTS FROM RIOT GAMES
body: did anyone just recieve gifts from riot games? i got 2 champions and 2 summoner icons.... i have no idea what they are for

replies.body: How did you receive notifications for these gifts? I checked your account and wasn't able to find any records of us sending you gifts today. o.o

Got the same going on just 2 or 3 minutes ago, i recieved taliyah, jayce, battlecast alpha skarner and 2 icons. The thing is i own all of that stuff and got nothing new. What i know for sure is that i recieved all that stuff through hextech crafting, maybe look for that.
I just received to fnatic Karthus and Deep sea Kog'maw and a summoner icon. idk for what
I received just now the giftst. Fnatic Karthus, deep sea kog'maw and a summoner icon. but for what?

Same here, i just got reaper soraka, and roadwarrior mf, though i think i already had reaper soraka.
It came in my notifications box
they might be from yesterday. did you guys give out good behavior rewards?
